text: Philip Beauchamp Hanson (born 5 July 1999) is a British racing driver currently competing in the FIA World Endurance Championship and the European Le Mans Series for United Autosports. In his early years as a racing driver, he competed in kart races in the United Kingdom. Unlike many other young drivers, he devoted himself to sports cars and GT racing, without having previously competed in open-wheel car racing. == Victories == Hanson, along with teammate Filipe Albuquerque, were the 2020 European Le Mans Series champions, winning three rounds of the championship. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:British racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from Berkshire
title: Philip Hanson
